site.description: Your trusted source for authentic Polynesian foods. We supply restaurants, retailers, and food service providers with premium Hawaiian, Samoan, and Tongan products.

hero.title: Authentic Polynesian Foods
hero.subtitle: From the Pacific Islands to your kitchen

intro.title: About Pacific Islander Foods
intro.description: For over 25 years, we've been the premier distributor of authentic Polynesian foods across the mainland. Our deep roots in Hawaiian, Samoan, and Tongan communities ensure every product we carry meets the highest standards of authenticity and quality.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Every product sourced directly from Pacific Island producers and trusted partners.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Rigorous quality control ensures only the finest products reach your customers.

community.title: Community
community.description: Supporting Pacific Islander communities and preserving culinary traditions.
